verses.verse: The <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and the solitary <S%H6723>place<s%> shall be <S%H7797>glad<s%> for them; and the <S%H6160>desert<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice,<s%> and <S%H6524>blossom<s%> as the <S%H2261>rose.<s%>

It shall blossom <S%H6524>abundantly,<s%> <S%H6524><s%> and <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> <S%H637>even<s%> with <S%H1525>joy<s%> and <S%H7442>singing:<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> unto it, the <S%H1926>excellency<s%> of <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> and <S%H8289>Sharon,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H1926>excellency<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> to them that are of a <S%H4116>fearful<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> Be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H408>not:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H5359>vengeance,<s%> even <S%H430>God<s%> with a <S%H1576>recompense;<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> you.
Then <S%H227><s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H5787>blind<s%> shall be <S%H6491>opened,<s%> and the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H2795>deaf<s%> shall be <S%H6605>unstopped.<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> shall the <S%H6455>lame<s%> man <S%H1801>leap<s%> as a <S%H354>hart,<s%> and the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H483>dumb<s%> <S%H7442>sing:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> shall <S%H4325>waters<s%> break <S%H1234>out,<s%> and <S%H5158>streams<s%> in the <S%H6160>desert.<s%>

And the parched <S%H8273>ground<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H98>pool,<s%> and the thirsty <S%H6774>land<s%> <S%H4002>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water:<s%> in the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of <S%H8565>dragons,<s%> where each <S%H7258>lay,<s%> shall be <S%H2682>grass<s%> with <S%H7070>reeds<s%> and <S%H1573>rushes.<s%>

And a <S%H4547>highway<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and a <S%H1870>way,<s%> and it shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> The <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H6944>holiness;<s%> the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> pass <S%H5674>over<s%> it; but <S%H1931>it<s%> shall be for those: the wayfaring <S%H1980>men,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> though <S%H191>fools,<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8582>err<s%> therein.

No <S%H3808><s%> <S%H738>lion<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H1077>nor<s%> any <S%H6530>ravenous<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> thereon, it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> but the <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> shall <S%H1980>walk<s%> there:

And the <S%H6299>ransomed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion<s%> with <S%H7440>songs<s%> and <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8342>joy<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H7218>heads:<s%> they shall <S%H5381>obtain<s%> <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> and <S%H585>sighing<s%> shall flee <S%H5127>away.<s%>
